title: Authentication Logging
lessonContent:
Authentication logging can be very useful to look at if you are having issues logging in. /var/log/auth.log This contains system authorization logs, such as user login and the authentication method used. Sample snippet: 
Jan 31 10:37:50 icebox pkexec: pam_unix(polkit-1:session): session opened for user root by (uid=1000)
exercise: Do some failed logins and then a successful one, look at your /var/log/auth.log and see what happened.
quizQuestion: What log is used for user authentication?
